verses.verse: הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <WH238> Give ear הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> O ye heavens וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <WH1696> and I will speak וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> and hear הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> O earth אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> of my mouth

יַעֲרֹ֤ף <WH6201> shall drop כַּמָּטָר֙ <WH4306> as the rain לִקְחִ֔י <WH3948> My doctrine תִּזַּ֥ל <WH5140> shall distil כַּטַּ֖ל <WH2919> as the dew אִמְרָתִ֑י <WH565> my speech כִּשְׂעִירִ֣ם <WH8164> as the small rain עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on דֶ֔שֶׁא <WH1877> upon the tender herb וְכִרְבִיבִ֖ים <WH7241> and as the showers עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <WH6212> upon the grass

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> Because I will publish הָב֥וּ <WH3051> ascribe גֹ֖דֶל <WH1433> ye greatness לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> unto our God

הַצּוּר֙ <WH6697> [He is] the Rock תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> [is] perfect פָּעֳל֔וֹ <WH6467> his work כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all דְּרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> for all his ways מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> [are] judgment אֵ֤ל <WH410> a God אֱמוּנָה֙ <WH530> of truth וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and without עָ֔וֶל <WH5766> and without iniquity צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> just וְיָשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> and right הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> They

שִׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> They have corrupted ל֛וֹ לֹ֖א <WH3808> not בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> [is] not [the spot] of his children מוּמָ֑ם <WH3971> themselves their spot דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> generation עִקֵּ֖שׁ <WH6141> [they are] a perverse וּפְתַלְתֹּֽל׃ <WH6618> and crooked

הֲ־ <WH3068> the LORD לַיְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD תִּגְמְלוּ־ <WH1580> Do ye thus requite זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise עַ֥ם <WH5971> people נָבָ֖ל <WH5036> O foolish וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not חָכָ֑ם <WH2450> cunning הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not הוּא֙ <WH1931> he אָבִ֣יךָ <WH1> fathers קָּנֶ֔ךָ <WH7069> [that] hath bought ה֥וּא <WH1931> He עָֽשְׂךָ֖ <WH6213> thee? hath he not made וַֽיְכֹנְנֶֽךָ׃ <WH3559> thee and established

זְכֹר֙ <WH2142> Remember יְמ֣וֹת <WH3117> the days עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> of old בִּ֖ינוּ <WH995> consider שְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> the years דּוֹר־ <WH1755> of many וָד֑וֹר <WH1755> generations שְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> ask אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father וְיַגֵּ֔דְךָ <WH5046> and he will shew זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <WH2205> thee thy elders וְיֹ֥אמְרוּ <WH559> and they will tell לָֽךְ׃

בְּהַנְחֵ֤ל <WH5157> their inheritance עֶלְיוֹן֙ <WH5945> When the most High גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> to the nations בְּהַפְרִיד֖וֹ <WH6504> when he separated בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of Adam יַצֵּב֙ <WH5324> he set גְּבֻלֹ֣ת <WH1367> the bounds עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> according to the number בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> portion יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> For the LORD'S עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> [is] his people יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob חֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> [is] the lot נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> of his inheritance

יִמְצָאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4672> He found בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land מִדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> him in a desert וּבְתֹ֖הוּ <WH8414> and in the waste יְלֵ֣ל <WH3214> howling יְשִׁמֹ֑ן <WH3452> wilderness יְסֹֽבְבֶ֙נְהוּ֙ <WH5437> he led him about יְב֣וֹנְנֵ֔הוּ <WH995> he instructed יִצְּרֶ֖נְהוּ <WH5341> him he kept כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <WH380> him as the apple עֵינֽוֹ׃ <WH5869> of his eye

כְּנֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH5404> As an eagle יָעִ֣יר <WH5782> stirreth up קִנּ֔וֹ <WH7064> her nest עַל־ <WH5921> over גּוֹזָלָ֖יו <WH1469> over her young יְרַחֵ֑ף <WH7363> fluttereth יִפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> spreadeth abroad כְּנָפָיו֙ <WH3671> her wings יִקָּחֵ֔הוּ <WH3947> taketh יִשָּׂאֵ֖הוּ <WH5375> them beareth עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH84> them on her wings
יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [So] the LORD בָּדָ֣ד <WH910> alone יַנְחֶ֑נּוּ <WH5148> did lead וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with אֵ֥ל <WH410> god נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> him and [there was] no strange

יַרְכִּבֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7392> He made him ride עַל־ <WH5921> and [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֣מֳתֵי <WH1116> height ק) אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וַיֹּאכַ֖ל <WH398> that he might eat תְּנוּבֹ֣ת <WH8570> the increase שָׂדָ֑י <WH7704> of the fields וַיֵּנִקֵ֤הֽוּ <WH3243> and he made him to suck דְבַשׁ֙ <WH1706> honey מִסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> out of the rock וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> and oil מֵחַלְמִ֥ישׁ <WH2496> out of the flinty צֽוּר׃ <WH6697> rock

חֶמְאַ֨ת <WH2529> Butter בָּקָ֜ר <WH1241> of kine וַחֲלֵ֣ב <WH2461> and milk צֹ֗אן <WH6629> of sheep עִם־ <WH5973> With חֵ֨לֶב <WH2459> with fat כָּרִ֜ים <WH3733> of lambs וְאֵילִ֤ים <WH352> and rams בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the breed בָשָׁן֙ <WH1316> of Bashan וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <WH6260> and goats עִם־ <WH5973> With חֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> with the fat כִּלְי֣וֹת <WH3629> of kidneys חִטָּ֑ה <WH2406> of wheat וְדַם־ <WH1818> blood עֵנָ֖ב <WH6025> of the grape תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> and thou didst drink חָֽמֶר׃ <WH2561> the pure

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ן <WH8080> waxed fat יְשֻׁרוּן֙ <WH3484> But Jeshurun וַיִּבְעָ֔ט <WH1163> and kicked שָׁמַ֖נְתָּ <WH8080> thou art waxen fat עָבִ֣יתָ <WH5666> thou art grown thick כָּשִׂ֑יתָ <WH3780> thou art covered וַיִּטֹּשׁ֙ <WH5203> [with fatness] then he forsook אֱל֣וֹהַ <WH433> God עָשָׂ֔הוּ <WH6213> [which] made וַיְנַבֵּ֖ל <WH5034> him and lightly esteemed צ֥וּר <WH6697> the Rock יְשֻׁעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> of his salvation
יַקְנִאֻ֖הוּ <WH7065> They provoked him to jealousy בְּזָרִ֑ים <WH2114> with strange בְּתוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <WH8441> [gods] with abominations יַכְעִיסֻֽהוּ׃ <WH3707> provoked they him to anger

יִזְבְּח֗וּ <WH2076> They sacrificed לַשֵּׁדִים֙ <WH7700> unto devils לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not אֱלֹ֔הַ <WH433> not to God אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> to gods לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not יְדָע֑וּם <WH3045> whom they knew חֲדָשִׁים֙ <WH2319> not to new מִקָּרֹ֣ב <WH7138> newly בָּ֔אוּ <WH935> up לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שְׂעָר֖וּם <WH8175> feared אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> whom your fathers
צ֥וּר <WH6697> Of the Rock יְלָדְךָ֖ <WH3205> [that] begat תֶּ֑שִׁי <WH7876> thee thou art unmindful וַתִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> and hast forgotten אֵ֥ל <WH410> God מְחֹלְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH2342> that formed

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And when the LORD וַיִּנְאָ֑ץ <WH5006> [it] he abhorred מִכַּ֥עַס <WH3708> [them] because of the provoking בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons וּבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1323> and of his daughters

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אַסְתִּ֤ירָה <WH5641> I will hide פָנַי֙ <WH6440> my face מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like אֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> from them I will see מָ֣ה <WH4100> what אַחֲרִיתָ֑ם <WH319> what their end כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ד֤וֹר <WH1755> generation תַּהְפֻּכֹת֙ <WH8419> [shall be] for they [are] a very froward הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children לֹא־ <WH3808> is no אֵמֻ֥ן <WH529> in whom [is] no faith בָּֽם׃

הֵ֚ם <WH1992> They קִנְא֣וּנִי <WH7065> They have moved me to jealousy בְלֹא־ <WH3808> with [that which is] not אֵ֔ל <WH410> God כִּעֲס֖וּנִי <WH3707> they have provoked me to anger בְּהַבְלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1892> with their vanities וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> Me אַקְנִיאֵ֣ם <WH7065> and I will move them to jealousy בְּלֹא־ <WH3808> are not עָ֔ם <WH5971> with [those which are] not a people בְּג֥וֹי <WH1471> nation נָבָ֖ל <WH5036> with a foolish אַכְעִיסֵֽם׃ <WH3707> I will provoke them to anger

כִּי־ <WH3588> For אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> For a fire קָדְחָ֣ה <WH6919> is kindled בְאַפִּ֔י <WH639> in mine anger וַתִּיקַ֖ד <WH3344> and shall burn עַד־ <WH5704> against שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> hell תַּחְתִּ֑ית <WH8482> unto the lowest וַתֹּ֤אכַל <WH398> and shall consume אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the earth וִֽיבֻלָ֔הּ <WH2981> with her increase וַתְּלַהֵ֖ט <WH3857> and set on fire מוֹסְדֵ֥י <WH4146> foundation הָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> of the mountains
אַסְפֶּ֥ה <WH5595> I will heap עָלֵ֖ימוֹ <WH5921> and רָע֑וֹת <WH7451> mischiefs חִצַּ֖י <WH2671> mine arrows אֲכַלֶּה־ <WH3615> upon them I will spend בָּֽם׃

מְזֵ֥י <WH4198> [They shall be] burnt רָעָ֛ב <WH7458> with hunger וּלְחֻ֥מֵי <WH3898> and devoured רֶ֖שֶׁף <WH7565> with burning heat וְקֶ֣טֶב <WH6986> destruction מְרִירִ֑י <WH4815> and with bitter וְשֶׁן־ <WH8127> the teeth בְּהֵמוֹת֙ <WH929> of beasts אֲשַׁלַּח־ <WH7971> I will also send בָּ֔ם עִם־ <WH5973> With חֲמַ֖ת <WH2534> upon them with the poison זֹחֲלֵ֥י <WH2119> of serpents עָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> of the dust

מִחוּץ֙ <WH2351> without תְּשַׁכֶּל־ <WH7921> shall destroy חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> The sword וּמֵחֲדָרִ֖ים <WH2315> within אֵימָ֑ה <WH367> and terror גַּם־ <WH1571> again בָּחוּר֙ <WH970> both the young man גַּם־ <WH1571> again בְּתוּלָ֔ה <WH1330> and the virgin יוֹנֵ֖ק <WH3243> the suckling עִם־ <WH5973> with אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> [also] with the man שֵׂיבָֽה׃ <WH7872> of gray hairs

אָמַ֖רְתִּי <WH559> I said אַפְאֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6284> I would scatter them into corners אַשְׁבִּ֥יתָה <WH7673> of them to cease מֵאֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH582> from among men זִכְרָֽם׃ <WH2143> I would make the remembrance

לוּלֵ֗י <WH3884> Were it not כַּ֤עַס <WH3708> the wrath אוֹיֵב֙ <WH341> of the enemy אָג֔וּר <WH1481> that I feared פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> lest יְנַכְּר֖וּ <WH5234> should behave themselves strangely צָרֵ֑ימוֹ <WH6862> lest their adversaries פֶּן־ <WH6435> would יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> [and] lest they should say יָדֵ֣ינוּ <WH3027> Our hand רָ֔מָה <WH7311> [is] high וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD פָּעַ֥ל <WH6466> hath not done כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

כִּי־ <WH3588> are a ג֛וֹי <WH1471> For they [are] a nation אֹבַ֥ד <WH6> void עֵצ֖וֹת <WH6098> of counsel הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there בָּהֶ֖ם תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> neither [is there any] understanding

ל֥וּ <WH3863> O that חָכְמ֖וּ <WH2449> they were wise יַשְׂכִּ֣ילוּ <WH7919> [that] they understood זֹ֑את <WH2063> would יָבִ֖ינוּ <WH995> this [that] they would consider לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃ <WH319> their latter end

אֵיכָ֞ה <WH349> how יִרְדֹּ֤ף <WH7291> chase אֶחָד֙ <WH259> How should one אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> a thousand וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> and two יָנִ֣יסוּ <WH5127> to flight רְבָבָ֑ה <WH7233> put ten אִם־ <WH518> except לֹא֙ <WH3808> except כִּי־ <WH3588> them צוּרָ֣ם <WH6697> their Rock מְכָרָ֔ם <WH4376> had sold וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD הִסְגִּירָֽם׃ <WH5462> had shut them up

כִּ֛י <WH3588> Indeed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not כְצוּרֵ֖נוּ <WH6697> For their rock צוּרָ֑ם <WH6697> [is] not as our Rock וְאֹיְבֵ֖ינוּ <WH341> even our enemies פְּלִילִֽים׃ <WH6414> themselves [being] judges

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For מִגֶּ֤פֶן <WH1612> For their vine סְדֹם֙ <WH5467> of Sodom גַּפְנָ֔ם <WH1612> [is] of the vine וּמִשַּׁדְמֹ֖ת <WH7709> and of the fields עֲמֹרָ֑ה <WH6017> of Gomorrah עֲנָבֵ֙מוֹ֙ <WH6025> their grapes עִנְּבֵי־ <WH6025> [are] grapes ר֔וֹשׁ <WH7219> of gall אַשְׁכְּלֹ֥ת <WH811> their clusters מְרֹרֹ֖ת <WH4846> [are] bitter לָֽמוֹ׃
חֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> [is] the poison תַּנִּינִ֖ם <WH8577> of dragons יֵינָ֑ם <WH3196> Their wine וְרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7219> venom פְּתָנִ֖ים <WH6620> of asps אַכְזָֽר׃ <WH393> and the cruel
הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not ה֖וּא <WH1931> he כָּמֻ֣ס <WH3647> [Is] not this laid up in store עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> Me חָתֻ֖ם <WH2856> with me [and] sealed up בְּאוֹצְרֹתָֽי׃ <WH214> treasure

לִ֤י נָקָם֙ <WH5359> To me [belongeth] vengeance וְשִׁלֵּ֔ם <WH8005> and recompence לְעֵ֖ת <WH6256> in [due] time תָּמ֣וּט <WH4131> shall slide רַגְלָ֑ם <WH7272> their foot כִּ֤י <WH3588> for קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <WH3117> for the day אֵידָ֔ם <WH343> of their calamity וְחָ֖שׁ <WH2363> upon them make haste עֲתִדֹ֥ת <WH6264> and the things that shall come לָֽמוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יָדִ֤ין <WH1777> shall judge יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people וְעַל־ <WH5921> on עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> himself for his servants יִתְנֶחָ֑ם <WH5162> and repent כִּ֤י <WH3588> When יִרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> when he seeth כִּי־ <WH3588> When אָ֣זְלַת <WH235> is gone יָ֔ד <WH3027> that [their] power וְאֶ֖פֶס <WH657> and [there is] none עָצ֥וּר <WH6113> shut up וְעָזֽוּב׃ <WH5800> or left
וְאָמַ֖ר <WH559> And he shall say אֵ֣י <WH335> Where אֱלֹהֵ֑ימוֹ <WH430> Where [are] their gods צ֖וּר <WH6697> [their] rock חָסָ֥יוּ <WH2620> in whom they trusted בֽוֹ׃

רְא֣וּ ׀ <WH7200> See עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I ה֔וּא <WH1931> I am He וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> now that I [even] I [am] he and [there is] no god עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against אֲנִ֧י <WH589> is I אָמִ֣ית <WH4191> with me I kill וַאֲחַיֶּ֗ה <WH2421> and I make alive מָחַ֙צְתִּי֙ <WH4272> I wound וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶרְפָּ֔א <WH7495> and I heal וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> is no מִיָּדִ֖י <WH3027> out of my hand מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> neither [is there any] that can deliver

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> For I lift up אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> to heaven יָדִ֑י <WH3027> my hand וְאָמַ֕רְתִּי <WH559> and say חַ֥י <WH2416> I live אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

אִם־ <WH518> If שַׁנּוֹתִי֙ <WH8150> If I whet בְּרַ֣ק <WH1300> my glittering חַרְבִּ֔י <WH2719> sword וְתֹאחֵ֥ז <WH270> take hold בְּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> on judgment יָדִ֑י <WH3027> and mine hand אָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> I will render נָקָם֙ <WH5359> vengeance לְצָרָ֔י <WH6862> to mine enemies וְלִמְשַׂנְאַ֖י <WH8130> them that hate אֲשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> and will reward

אַשְׁכִּ֤יר <WH7937> drunk חִצַּי֙ <WH2671> I will make mine arrows מִדָּ֔ם <WH1818> with blood וְחַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> and my sword תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> shall devour בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> flesh מִדַּ֤ם <WH1818> [and that] with the blood חָלָל֙ <WH2491> of the slain וְשִׁבְיָ֔ה <WH7633> and of the captives מֵרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> from the beginning פַּרְע֥וֹת <WH6546> of revenges אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> upon the enemy

וַיְכַ֣ל <WH3615> made an end מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses לְדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> of speaking אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> to all Israel

כִּ֠י <WH3588> indeed לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not דָבָ֨ר <WH1697> thing רֵ֥ק <WH7386> For it [is] not a vain הוּא֙ <WH1931> he מִכֶּ֔ם <WH4480> at כִּי־ <WH3588> indeed ה֖וּא <WH1931> he חַיֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH2416> for you because it [is] your life וּבַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> and through this thing הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this תַּאֲרִ֤יכוּ <WH748> ye shall prolong יָמִים֙ <WH3117> [your] days עַל־ <WH5921> in הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֧ים <WH5674> whither ye go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <WH3383> Jordan שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess פ

וּמֻ֗ת <WH4191> And die בָּהָר֙ <WH2022> in the mount אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you עֹלֶ֣ה <WH5927> whither thou goest up שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> in it וְהֵאָסֵ֖ף <WH622> and be gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמֶּ֑יךָ <WH5971> unto thy people כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after מֵ֞ת <WH4191> died אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> as Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> thy brother בְּהֹ֣ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> in mount וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <WH622> and was gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <WH5971> unto his people

עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you מְעַלְתֶּ֜ם <WH4603> Because ye trespassed בִּ֗י בְּתוֹךְ֙ <WH8432> against me among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּמֵֽי־ <WH4325> at the waters מְרִיבַ֥ת <WH4808> provocation קָדֵ֖שׁ <WH6946> Kadesh מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the wilderness צִ֑ן <WH6790> of Zin עַ֣ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not קִדַּשְׁתֶּם֙ <WH6942> because ye sanctified אוֹתִ֔י <WH853> בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> me not in the midst בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
